title: Hardening OO Workflow Designer
content:
This topic provides recommendations for safeguarding your OO Workflow Designer deployment from security risks or threats.

Some of the most important reasons to secure an application include protecting the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of an organization's critical information.

To comprehensively protect your OO Workflow Designer system, it is necessary to secure both OO Workflow Designer and the computing environment (for example, the infrastructure and the operating system) upon which the application runs.

The Hardening section provides recommendations to help secure OO Workflow Designer at the application level and does not cover how to secure the infrastructure within the customer environment. The user is solely responsible for understanding the infrastructure or environment and applying the respective hardening policies.

This topic describes how to configure security hardening for OO Workflow Designer and includes the following topics.

  • Security hardening recommendations for OO Workflow Designer
  • Work with server and client certificates for OO Workflow Designer
  • Encrypt the communication using a server certificate for OO Workflow Designer
  • TLS support for OO Workflow Designer
